CustomField.description: The HRIS nightly feed will take the first payroll run date and the branch # into account. If the branch # is not in the 400s (Core), it will copy the First Run Date into this field. Note: This is for Core Advanced and Flex only. It uses the branch # to determine whether to use the Core date or MMS date. Branch # in the 400s = MMS.
CustomField.label: Core Start Date
